channel.title: [317] client keeps closing [317]
channel.description: well guys every time that i log into a 317 on a desktop client then i click a place and then the client closes can this be fixeD? i dont like it too much and it's not just one client it's all 317 client's please help me :'(

item.title: [317] client keeps closing [317]
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Right Click Your Run, and edit.

Replace that code, with this one.

@Echo off "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\Javaw.exe" -Xmx254m -classpath .;Theme.jar Gui 0 0 lowmem members 32 exit

Read full topic
